UnmannedDailyChance.title: Unmanned Daily Run Weight
description: The weight at which the <c=artifact>UNMANNED RUN</c> modifier will even be possible.
<c=boldPink>1.0</c> makes it appear as often as other modifiers.

<c=boldPink>1.0</c> makes it appear as often as other modifiers.
